name: Dreamconnection
description:
Game about a boy and his dog

We made a "non-GMTK" Version with an ending scene if you like to try it:
https://magicstunts123.itch.io/dreamconnection-not-gmkt-version

Enter a new dimension and help a little kid going through it's biggest nightmares! Use your flashlight to guide the way and find your way out from this hell.

Action
Move
W/A/S/DJumpSpaceLook around
MouseInteract
ESwitch character
ShiftCall dog back
QRestartR
